subject: Re: RS 12-469 Questions on How to Use
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
This is just my opinion, but when it mixes in the sound chamber and 
is picked up by the mic, it changes from being radio bits to 
something more...and I think "this more" is what is being used to 
formulate words and sentences.  ;)

LC

http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
